data.card_desc: Pan-fry lean chicken breast with lime, chilli and garlic, then pile onto seeded tortilla wraps. Cool before assembling if packing for lunch
Enjoy this nutrient-packed salad, with juicy tomatoes and cucumber, as a delicious and healthy lunch
Use seeded tortillas as pizza bases for a quick and healthy lunch - crack an egg in the centre and bake to boost protein intake
Give the classic Italian tomato and stale bread salad a seasonal twist with hazelnuts, cranberries, squash and apple
Try this brilliant Egyptian recipe from the head chef of London restaurant Ombra. Made using fava beans, it’s mashed into a chunky purée along with garlic, lemon and tahini

data.card_title: Pasta salad with tuna, capers & balsamic dressing
data.card_desc: Update tuna pasta salad by skipping the mayo and adding balsamic vinegar, olive oil, colourful tomatoes and celery
Take a healthy Vietnamese approach to salads by using cold vermicelli noodles with a sweet dressing, shellfish, coriander and mint
A vibrant Vietnamese-style seafood salad with coriander, carrots and spring onions

data.card_title: Miso prawn skewers with veggie rice salad
data.card_desc: For a new way with prawns, marinade in soya, serve as kebabs and team with healthy basmati
Bypass bread croutons and a heavy cream dressing and instead serve up a crispy, fruity salad with shellfish
Cauliflower is often overlooked, but try it roasted in this winter salad for a plateful of crunchy goodness

data.card_title: Barbecued fennel with black olive dressing
data.card_desc: Slice fennel and chargrill it as the base to a salad dressed with Kalamata olives, parsley, basil and garlic
Get your day's vegetable quota all in one go. Great for feeding a group, or freeze portions
Inspired by the Vietnamese dish, Bun xao, this fresh-tasting salad has very little fat but is so satisfying
Too hot to cook? This superhealthy salad makes a refreshing light lunch or starter

data.card_title: Vegan curried squash, lentil & coconut soup
data.card_desc: Flavour up butternut squash with Indian spices for this warming and healthy vegan soup. Serve with naan for a hearty lunch
Serve your grain with cucumber, apricot, peppers, olives and tomatoes then drizzle with lemon-infused oil for a mellow finish
Swap a mayonnaise base for cherry tomatoes, olives, roasted red peppers and fresh Italian herbs in this low-fat salad
This speedy salad will keep in the fridge for a few days - a great healthy lunch or snack to have on hand
This full-of-flavour autumnal salad has a zesty kick and is best eaten straight away

data.card_title: Squash & barley salad with balsamic vinaigrette
data.card_desc: A flavour-packed, unusual salad that's delicious warm or cold - works really well as part of a buffet
Get four of your five-a-day in one colourful bowl. Vary the veg according to what's in season
Steak doesn't have to be a heavy meal - give it a Japanese-style marinade for a low-fat supper
Reach into your storecupboard for pulses and sweetcorn to form the base for this simple side with hot, sweet dressing
